title: Smart Screen System
detail: A smart network of interactive digital displays embedded with sensors
extended_details: We will build a smart network of multiple LCD displays that will communicate with one another and create a new experience for users. Users will be able to physically manipulate the displays in unique ways to create visually appealing effects, play games, and experience both audio and visual technology in an entirely new way. The displays will be embedded with sensors (accelerometers, gyros, cameras, etc) that will track user interactions and dynamically modify the images that they display in response to the user's demands.
